abstract: Sun Microsystems, waiting for European regulators to approve its acquisition by Oracle, plans to cut as many as 3,000 jobs, or about 10 percent of the work force, to pare expenses over the next 12 months.
snippet: Sun Microsystems, waiting for European regulators to approve its acquisition by Oracle, plans to cut as many as 3,000 jobs, or about 10 percent of the work force, to pare expenses over the next 12 months.
lead_paragraph: Sun Microsystems, waiting for European regulators to approve its acquisition by Oracle, plans to cut as many as 3,000 jobs, or about 10 percent of the work force, to pare expenses over the next 12 months.

headline.main: Awaiting Green Light for Deal, Sun Cuts Jobs
